Class BlockchainService

  • java.lang.Object
    • juniter.service.bma.BlockchainService
  • @RestController
@ConditionalOnExpression("${juniter.bma.enabled:false}")
@RequestMapping("/blockchain")
public class BlockchainService
extends java.lang.Object
